name: Shortcuts
description: Perform common tasks with your keyboard.
author: Mathieu Ablasou <taupiqueur.kanto@gmail.com>

002.goBack.description: Navigation · Go back to the previous page in tab’s history

003.goForward.description: Navigation · Go forward to the next page in tab’s history

005.reloadTabWithoutCache.description: Navigation · Reload selected tabs, ignoring cached content

006.goToNextPage.description: Navigation · Go to the next page in the series

007.goToPreviousPage.description: Navigation · Go to the previous page in the series

009.goUp.description: Navigation · Go up in the URL hierarchy

010.goToRoot.description: Navigation · Go to the root URL

014.copyURL.description: Clipboard · Copy URL of selected tabs

015.copyTitle.description: Clipboard · Copy title of selected tabs

016.copyTitleAndURL.description: Clipboard · Copy title and URL of selected tabs

017.openWebSearchForSelectedText.description: Web search · Perform a web search for selected text

026.scrollToTop.description: Scroll · Scroll to the top of the page

027.scrollToBottom.description: Scroll · Scroll to the bottom of the page

031.toggleFullScreen.description: Zoom · Turn full-screen mode on or off

032.openNewTab.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab

033.openNewTabRight.description: Create tabs · Open and activate a new tab to the right

034.openNewWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window

035.openNewIncognitoWindow.description: Create tabs · Open a new window in Incognito mode

038.closeRightTabs.description: Close tabs · Close tabs to the right

039.closeWindow.description: Close tabs · Close the window that contains the tab

040.restoreTab.description: Close tabs · Reopen previously closed tabs

042.togglePinTab.description: Tab state · Pin or unpin selected tabs

043.toggleGroupTab.description: Tab state · Group or ungroup selected tabs

044.toggleCollapseTabGroups.description: Tab state · Collapse or uncollapse tab groups

045.toggleMuteTab.description: Tab state · Mute or unmute selected tabs

047.sortTabsByURL.description: Organize tabs · Sort selected tabs by URL

048.groupTabsByDomain.description: Organize tabs · Group selected tabs by domain

049.renameTabGroup.description: Manage tab groups · Rename tab group

050.cycleTabGroupColorForward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle forward through tab group colors

051.cycleTabGroupColorBackward.description: Manage tab groups · Cycle backward through tab group colors

052.activateAudibleTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the first audible tab

053.activateNextTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the next open tab

054.activatePreviousTab.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open tab

074.activatePreviousWindow.description: Switch tabs · Activate the previous open window

076.moveTabLeft.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs left

078.moveTabFirst.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far left

079.moveTabLast.description: Move tabs · Move selected tabs to the far right

091.bookmarkTab.description: Bookmarks · Save selected tabs as bookmarks

092.bookmarkSession.description: Bookmarks · Save the current session as bookmarks

093.addTabToReadingList.description: Reading list · Add selected tabs to your reading list
